name: Connor Hart
body:
# Hi! I'm Connor Hart, welcome to my page!

I am a student-athlete at GW majoring in business analytics with a minor in statistics. Currently, I am a staff writer for the campus news outlet "The Rival" and a development intern for the application "Tagamo." ## Hobbies and Activities -Swimming -Listening to music -Cooking

## Professional Experince
Staff Writer, The Rival, LLC
Write featured articles, mainly focused on music and culture, of my own submission and commissioned ideas. Wrote music article contracted by Red Bull for a marketing campaign. Maintained strict deadlines while retaining meetings with editor and presenting ideas in a group setting on a weekly basis.
Intern, Tagamo, LLC
Tagamo is a geo-oriented newsfeed for everything active and social that your friends and friends-of-friends are doing. ## Contact
  • email
  • facebook
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
